Self: 3 turns MAX BRV Up I
Group  PG attack of element of equipped summon (other than Sylph)
Group  PF attack after summon's effect
Deals proportionate HP damage to each target
Equipping following summons triggers special effect:
 â€¢ Sylph: Grants BRV and restores party's HP based on own ATK (no group  PG attack)
 â€¢ Odin: Moderate chance of inflicting Break
 â€¢ Pandemonium: Easier knock back
